channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Black bins stolen, 9th June
item.description:
The bins from outside my building have been stolen. I've reported it twice but there's been no response. Can we have new ones please? Preferably at least three

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Beatty Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
